reviews.text: Visited Mel‚Äôs Drive-In on a Saturday just before noon. The diner had a great retro vibe, and to our surprise, there was no queue at that time. Service was quick, and the food was served promptly. The tandoori chicken burger was a delightful twist‚Äîflavorful and satisfying. The sweet potato fries were crispy and paired well with the meal. Overall, a fun dining experience with a nostalgic atmosphere, perfect for a quick bite during your Universal Studios visit. Would recommend stopping by!

Its the most expensive burger and fries that I ever bought ü•≤ü•≤ü•≤

But as long as my daughter happy, its fine. The burger cost about IDR 200k and IDR 100k for a fries.

Great atmosphere but honestly the food was lacking. The burger was a ok but not very tasty however the fries were cold we had to get them changed. The chicken nuggets and milkshake were good but I wouldn't recommend eating there. There are better options in the Park such as the pizza for the same money.

song pon was very approachable, friendly, smiley, and he gave us stickers!! he was also very respectful and kind. he provided exceptional service (helping us with our trays when we didn‚Äôt know where to put it) he also keeps an eye on customer‚Äôs well being. A very uniquely pleasant restaurant deco, clean and a nice place to end a tiring day of activities with the kids over at the USS.

The staff over at the cashier, Amirah was very attentive and helpful, to assist us getting a baby chair before we even asked for it!
A small gesture that adds the first experience to our USS trip a wonderful one.

The kids love it here!!!

I personally love the tandoori chicken burger.

Pricing can be more affordable.
And maybe in future, they can have drinks included too in thier set.

Overall, a good place to dine with the family.
Keep it upüëçüèºüëçüèº
